name: Dead On Arrival (Lunar Panda Studios, Eoin Matthews, AlexanderSlous, Ben Hendry, David Ling)
name_original: Dead On Arrival (Lunar Panda Studios, Eoin Matthews, AlexanderSlous, Ben Hendry, David Ling)
description:
Dead On Arrival

Welcome to Dead On Arrival, an atmospheric horror-puzzle game about the life of Sean Ashford and its many lows.

Story

While on the train home from work, Sean Ashford receives a cryptic warning from a Mysterious Passenger, as a freak accident causes the train to derail. Waking up after the crash, seemingly unharmed and back aboard the intact train, Sean dismisses the crash as a nightmare. But as things turn out not to be what they seem, and Sean’s past returns to haunt him, the real nightmare is only about to begin.

Features

- Immersive narrative: Told through both items in-game and cutscenes this will be a story to remember

- Complex puzzles: Original puzzles that can't be solved easily, better keep an eye out for clues

- Great atmosphere: Lighting, VFX, sound design and expert level design has been used to lovingly craft the atmosphere throughout the entire game

- Scary Horror: Using suspenseful horror elements it uses the great atmosphere to its advantage to deliver a truly terrifying experience

- A first-person adventure: Featuring 4 detailed and content-full levels with varied locales
